2376# if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(7, 0, 0)
2377/*!
2378 \overload
2379 Returns the glyph indexes and positions for all glyphs in this QTextLine for characters
2380 in the range defined by \a from and \a length. The \a from index is relative to the beginning
2381 of the text in the containing QTextLayout, and the range must be within the range of QTextLine
2382 as given by functions textStart() and textLength().
2383
2384 If \a from is negative, it will default to textStart(), and if \a length is negative it will
2385 default to the return value of textLength().
2386
2387 \note This is equivalent to calling
2388 glyphRuns(from,
2389 length,
2390 QTextLayout::GlyphRunRetrievalFlag::GlyphIndexes |
2391 QTextLayout::GlyphRunRetrievalFlag::GlyphPositions).
2392
2393 \since 5.0
2394
2395 \sa QTextLayout::glyphRuns()
2396*/
2397QList<QGlyphRun> QTextLine::glyphRuns(int from, int length) const
2398{
2399 return glyphRuns(from, length, flags: QTextLayout::GlyphRunRetrievalFlag::DefaultRetrievalFlags);
2400}
2401# endif
2402
2403/*!
2404 Returns the glyph indexes and positions for all glyphs in this QTextLine for characters
2405 in the range defined by \a from and \a length. The \a from index is relative to the beginning
2406 of the text in the containing QTextLayout, and the range must be within the range of QTextLine
2407 as given by functions textStart() and textLength().
2408
2409 The \a retrievalFlags specifies which properties of the QGlyphRun will be retrieved from the
2410 layout. To minimize allocations and memory consumption, this should be set to include only the
2411 properties that you need to access later.
2412
2413 If \a from is negative, it will default to textStart(), and if \a length is negative it will
2414 default to the return value of textLength().
2415
2416 \since 6.5
2417
2418 \sa QTextLayout::glyphRuns()
2419*/
2420QList<QGlyphRun> QTextLine::glyphRuns(int from,
2421 int length,
2422 QTextLayout::GlyphRunRetrievalFlags retrievalFlags) const
2423{
2424 const QScriptLine &line = eng->lines.at(i: index);
2425
2426 if (line.length == 0)
2427 return QList<QGlyphRun>();
2428
2429 if (from < 0)
2430 from = textStart();
2431
2432 if (length < 0)
2433 length = textLength();
2434
2435 if (length == 0)
2436 return QList<QGlyphRun>();
2437
2438 QTextLayout::FormatRange selection;
2439 selection.start = from;
2440 selection.length = length;
2441
2442 QTextLineItemIterator iterator(eng, index, QPointF(), &selection);
2443 qreal y = line.y.toReal() + line.base().toReal();
2444 QList<QGlyphRun> glyphRuns;
2445 while (!iterator.atEnd()) {
2446 QScriptItem &si = iterator.next();
2447 if (si.analysis.flags >= QScriptAnalysis::TabOrObject)
2448 continue;
2449
2450 if (from >= 0 && length >= 0 && (from >= iterator.itemEnd || from + length <= iterator.itemStart))
2451 continue;
2452
2453 QPointF pos(iterator.x.toReal(), y);
2454
2455 QFont font;
2456 QGlyphRun::GlyphRunFlags flags;
2457 if (!eng->useRawFont) {
2458 font = eng->font(si);
2459 if (font.overline())
2460 flags |= QGlyphRun::Overline;
2461 if (font.underline())
2462 flags |= QGlyphRun::Underline;
2463 if (font.strikeOut())
2464 flags |= QGlyphRun::StrikeOut;
2465 }
2466
2467 bool rtl = false;
2468 if (si.analysis.bidiLevel % 2) {
2469 flags |= QGlyphRun::RightToLeft;
2470 rtl = true;
2471 }
2472
2473 int relativeFrom = qMax(a: iterator.itemStart, b: from) - si.position;
2474 int relativeTo = qMin(a: iterator.itemEnd, b: from + length) - 1 - si.position;
2475
2476 unsigned short *logClusters = eng->logClusters(si: &si);
2477 int glyphsStart = logClusters[relativeFrom];
2478 int glyphsEnd = (relativeTo == iterator.itemLength) ? si.num_glyphs - 1 : logClusters[relativeTo];
2479 // the glyph index right next to the requested range
2480 int nextGlyphIndex = (relativeTo < iterator.itemLength - 1) ? logClusters[relativeTo + 1] : si.num_glyphs;
2481 if (nextGlyphIndex - 1 > glyphsEnd)
2482 glyphsEnd = nextGlyphIndex - 1;
2483 bool startsInsideLigature = relativeFrom > 0 && logClusters[relativeFrom - 1] == glyphsStart;
2484 bool endsInsideLigature = nextGlyphIndex == glyphsEnd;
2485
2486 int itemGlyphsStart = logClusters[iterator.itemStart - si.position];
2487 int itemGlyphsEnd = logClusters[iterator.itemEnd - 1 - si.position];
2488
2489 QGlyphLayout glyphLayout = eng->shapedGlyphs(si: &si);
2490
2491 // Calculate new x position of glyph layout for a subset. This becomes somewhat complex
2492 // when we're breaking a RTL script item, since the expected position passed into
2493 // getGlyphPositions() is the left-most edge of the left-most glyph in an RTL run.
2494 if (relativeFrom != (iterator.itemStart - si.position) && !rtl) {
2495 for (int i = itemGlyphsStart; i < glyphsStart; ++i) {
2496 if (!glyphLayout.attributes[i].dontPrint) {
2497 QFixed justification = QFixed::fromFixed(fixed: glyphLayout.justifications[i].space_18d6);
2498 pos.rx() += (glyphLayout.advances[i] + justification).toReal();
2499 }
2500 }
2501 } else if (relativeTo != (iterator.itemEnd - si.position - 1) && rtl) {
2502 for (int i = itemGlyphsEnd; i > glyphsEnd; --i) {
2503 if (!glyphLayout.attributes[i].dontPrint) {
2504 QFixed justification = QFixed::fromFixed(fixed: glyphLayout.justifications[i].space_18d6);
2505 pos.rx() += (glyphLayout.advances[i] + justification).toReal();
2506 }
2507 }
2508 }
2509
2510 glyphLayout = glyphLayout.mid(position: glyphsStart, n: glyphsEnd - glyphsStart + 1);
2511
2512 QFixed x;
2513 QFixed width;
2514 iterator.getSelectionBounds(selectionX: &x, selectionWidth: &width);
2515
2516 if (glyphLayout.numGlyphs > 0) {
2517 QFontEngine *mainFontEngine;
2518#ifndef QT_NO_RAWFONT
2519 if (eng->useRawFont && eng->rawFont.isValid())
2520 mainFontEngine= eng->fontEngine(si);
2521 else
2522#endif
2523 mainFontEngine = font.d->engineForScript(script: si.analysis.script);
2524
2525 if (mainFontEngine->type() == QFontEngine::Multi) {
2526 QFontEngineMulti *multiFontEngine = static_cast<QFontEngineMulti *>(mainFontEngine);
2527 int start = rtl ? glyphLayout.numGlyphs : 0;
2528 int end = start - 1;
2529 int which = glyphLayout.glyphs[rtl ? start - 1 : end + 1] >> 24;
2530 for (; (rtl && start > 0) || (!rtl && end < glyphLayout.numGlyphs - 1);
2531 rtl ? --start : ++end) {
2532 const int e = glyphLayout.glyphs[rtl ? start - 1 : end + 1] >> 24;
2533 if (e == which)
2534 continue;
2535
2536 QGlyphLayout subLayout = glyphLayout.mid(position: start, n: end - start + 1);
2537 multiFontEngine->ensureEngineAt(at: which);
2538
2539 QGlyphRun::GlyphRunFlags subFlags = flags;
2540 if (start == 0 && startsInsideLigature)
2541 subFlags |= QGlyphRun::SplitLigature;
2542
2543 {
2544 QGlyphRun glyphRun = glyphRunWithInfo(fontEngine: multiFontEngine->engine(at: which),
2545 text: eng->text,
2546 glyphLayout: subLayout,
2547 pos,
2548 flags: subFlags,
2549 retrievalFlags,
2550 selectionX: x,
2551 selectionWidth: width,
2552 glyphsStart: glyphsStart + start,
2553 glyphsEnd: glyphsStart + end,
2554 logClusters: logClusters + relativeFrom,
2555 textPosition: relativeFrom + si.position,
2556 textLength: relativeTo - relativeFrom + 1);
2557 if (!glyphRun.isEmpty())
2558 glyphRuns.append(t: glyphRun);
2559 }
2560 for (int i = 0; i < subLayout.numGlyphs; ++i) {
2561 if (!subLayout.attributes[i].dontPrint) {
2562 QFixed justification = QFixed::fromFixed(fixed: subLayout.justifications[i].space_18d6);
2563 pos.rx() += (subLayout.advances[i] + justification).toReal();
2564 }
2565 }
2566
2567 if (rtl)
2568 end = start - 1;
2569 else
2570 start = end + 1;
2571 which = e;
2572 }
2573
2574 QGlyphLayout subLayout = glyphLayout.mid(position: start, n: end - start + 1);
2575 multiFontEngine->ensureEngineAt(at: which);
2576
2577 QGlyphRun::GlyphRunFlags subFlags = flags;
2578 if ((start == 0 && startsInsideLigature) || endsInsideLigature)
2579 subFlags |= QGlyphRun::SplitLigature;
2580
2581 QGlyphRun glyphRun = glyphRunWithInfo(fontEngine: multiFontEngine->engine(at: which),
2582 text: eng->text,
2583 glyphLayout: subLayout,
2584 pos,
2585 flags: subFlags,
2586 retrievalFlags,
2587 selectionX: x,
2588 selectionWidth: width,
2589 glyphsStart: glyphsStart + start,
2590 glyphsEnd: glyphsStart + end,
2591 logClusters: logClusters + relativeFrom,
2592 textPosition: relativeFrom + si.position,
2593 textLength: relativeTo - relativeFrom + 1);
2594 if (!glyphRun.isEmpty())
2595 glyphRuns.append(t: glyphRun);
2596 } else {
2597 if (startsInsideLigature || endsInsideLigature)
2598 flags |= QGlyphRun::SplitLigature;
2599 QGlyphRun glyphRun = glyphRunWithInfo(fontEngine: mainFontEngine,
2600 text: eng->text,
2601 glyphLayout,
2602 pos,
2603 flags,
2604 retrievalFlags,
2605 selectionX: x,
2606 selectionWidth: width,
2607 glyphsStart,
2608 glyphsEnd,
2609 logClusters: logClusters + relativeFrom,
2610 textPosition: relativeFrom + si.position,
2611 textLength: relativeTo - relativeFrom + 1);
2612 if (!glyphRun.isEmpty())
2613 glyphRuns.append(t: glyphRun);
2614 }
2615 }
2616 }
2617
2618 return glyphRuns;
2619}

2622/*!
2623 \fn void QTextLine::draw(QPainter *painter, const QPointF &position) const
2624
2625 Draws a line on the given \a painter at the specified \a position.
2626*/
2627void QTextLine::draw(QPainter *painter, const QPointF &position) const
2628{
2629 draw_internal(p: painter, pos: position, selection: nullptr);
2630}
2631
2632void QTextLine::draw_internal(QPainter *p, const QPointF &origPos,
2633 const QTextLayout::FormatRange *selection) const
2634{
2635#ifndef QT_NO_RAWFONT
2636 // Not intended to work with rawfont
2637 Q_ASSERT(!eng->useRawFont);
2638#endif
2639 const QScriptLine &line = eng->lines[index];
2640 QPen pen = p->pen();
2641
2642 bool noText = (selection && selection->format.property(SuppressText).toBool());
2643
2644 if (!line.length) {
2645 if (selection
2646 && selection->start <= line.from
2647 && selection->start + selection->length > line.from) {
2648
2649 const qreal lineHeight = line.height().toReal();
2650 QRectF r(origPos.x() + line.x.toReal(), origPos.y() + line.y.toReal(),
2651 lineHeight / 2, QFontMetrics(eng->font()).horizontalAdvance(u' '));
2652 setPenAndDrawBackground(p, defaultPen: QPen(), chf: selection->format, r);
2653 p->setPen(pen);
2654 }
2655 return;
2656 }
2657
2658 Q_CONSTINIT static QRectF maxFixedRect(-QFIXED_MAX / 2, -QFIXED_MAX / 2, QFIXED_MAX, QFIXED_MAX);
2659 const bool xlateToFixedRange = !maxFixedRect.contains(p: origPos);
2660 QPointF pos;
2661 if (Q_LIKELY(!xlateToFixedRange))
2662 pos = origPos;
2663 else
2664 p->translate(offset: origPos);
2665
2666 QTextLineItemIterator iterator(eng, index, pos, selection);
2667 QFixed lineBase = line.base();
2668 eng->clearDecorations();
2669 eng->enableDelayDecorations();
2670
2671 const QFixed y = QFixed::fromReal(r: pos.y()) + line.y + lineBase;
2672
2673 const QTextFormatCollection *formatCollection = eng->formatCollection();
2674
2675 bool suppressColors = (eng->option.flags() & QTextOption::SuppressColors);
2676 while (!iterator.atEnd()) {
2677 QScriptItem &si = iterator.next();
2678
2679 if (selection && selection->start >= 0 && iterator.isOutsideSelection())
2680 continue;
2681
2682 if (si.analysis.flags == QScriptAnalysis::LineOrParagraphSeparator
2683 && !(eng->option.flags() & QTextOption::ShowLineAndParagraphSeparators))
2684 continue;
2685
2686 QFixed itemBaseLine = y;
2687 QFont f = eng->font(si);
2688 QTextCharFormat format;
2689 if (formatCollection != nullptr)
2690 format = formatCollection->defaultTextFormat();
2691
2692 if (eng->hasFormats() || selection || formatCollection) {
2693 format.merge(other: eng->format(si: &si));
2694
2695 if (suppressColors) {
2696 format.clearForeground();
2697 format.clearBackground();
2698 format.clearProperty(propertyId: QTextFormat::TextUnderlineColor);
2699 }
2700 if (selection)
2701 format.merge(other: selection->format);
2702
2703 setPenAndDrawBackground(p, defaultPen: pen, chf: format, r: QRectF(iterator.x.toReal(), (y - lineBase).toReal(),
2704 iterator.itemWidth.toReal(), line.height().toReal()));
2705
2706 const qreal baseLineOffset = format.baselineOffset() / 100.0;
2707 QTextCharFormat::VerticalAlignment valign = format.verticalAlignment();
2708 if (valign == QTextCharFormat::AlignSuperScript
2709 || valign == QTextCharFormat::AlignSubScript
2710 || !qFuzzyIsNull(d: baseLineOffset))
2711 {
2712 QFontEngine *fe = f.d->engineForScript(script: si.analysis.script);
2713 QFixed height = fe->ascent() + fe->descent();
2714 itemBaseLine -= height * QFixed::fromReal(r: baseLineOffset);
2715
2716 if (valign == QTextCharFormat::AlignSubScript)
2717 itemBaseLine += height * QFixed::fromReal(r: format.subScriptBaseline() / 100.0);
2718 else if (valign == QTextCharFormat::AlignSuperScript)
2719 itemBaseLine -= height * QFixed::fromReal(r: format.superScriptBaseline() / 100.0);
2720 }
2721 }
2722
2723 if (si.analysis.flags >= QScriptAnalysis::TabOrObject) {
2724
2725 if (eng->hasFormats()) {
2726 p->save();
2727 if (si.analysis.flags == QScriptAnalysis::Object && QTextDocumentPrivate::get(block&: eng->block)) {
2728 QFixed itemY = y - si.ascent;
2729 switch (format.verticalAlignment()) {
2730 case QTextCharFormat::AlignTop:
2731 itemY = y - lineBase;
2732 break;
2733 case QTextCharFormat::AlignMiddle:
2734 itemY = y - lineBase + (line.height() - si.height()) / 2;
2735 break;
2736 case QTextCharFormat::AlignBottom:
2737 itemY = y - lineBase + line.height() - si.height();
2738 break;
2739 default:
2740 break;
2741 }
2742
2743 QRectF itemRect(iterator.x.toReal(), itemY.toReal(), iterator.itemWidth.toReal(), si.height().toReal());
2744
2745 eng->docLayout()->drawInlineObject(painter: p, rect: itemRect,
2746 object: QTextInlineObject(iterator.item, eng),
2747 posInDocument: si.position + eng->block.position(),
2748 format);
2749 if (selection) {
2750 QBrush bg = format.brushProperty(ObjectSelectionBrush);
2751 if (bg.style() != Qt::NoBrush) {
2752 QColor c = bg.color();
2753 c.setAlpha(128);
2754 p->fillRect(itemRect, color: c);
2755 }
2756 }
2757 } else { // si.isTab
2758 QFont f = eng->font(si);
2759 QTextItemInt gf(si, &f, format);
2760 gf.chars = nullptr;
2761 gf.num_chars = 0;
2762 gf.width = iterator.itemWidth;
2763 QPainterPrivate::get(painter: p)->drawTextItem(p: QPointF(iterator.x.toReal(), y.toReal()), ti: gf, textEngine: eng);
2764 if (eng->option.flags() & QTextOption::ShowTabsAndSpaces) {
2765 const QChar visualTab = QChar(QChar::VisualTabCharacter);
2766 int w = QFontMetrics(f).horizontalAdvance(visualTab);
2767 qreal x = iterator.itemWidth.toReal() - w; // Right-aligned
2768 if (x < 0)
2769 p->setClipRect(QRectF(iterator.x.toReal(), line.y.toReal(),
2770 iterator.itemWidth.toReal(), line.height().toReal()),
2771 op: Qt::IntersectClip);
2772 else
2773 x /= 2; // Centered
2774 p->setFont(f);
2775 p->drawText(p: QPointF(iterator.x.toReal() + x,
2776 y.toReal()), s: visualTab);
2777 }
2778
2779 }
2780 p->restore();
2781 }
2782
2783 continue;
2784 }
2785
2786 unsigned short *logClusters = eng->logClusters(si: &si);
2787 QGlyphLayout glyphs = eng->shapedGlyphs(si: &si);
2788
2789 QTextItemInt gf(glyphs.mid(position: iterator.glyphsStart, n: iterator.glyphsEnd - iterator.glyphsStart),
2790 &f, eng->layoutData->string.unicode() + iterator.itemStart,
2791 iterator.itemEnd - iterator.itemStart, eng->fontEngine(si), format);
2792 gf.logClusters = logClusters + iterator.itemStart - si.position;
2793 gf.width = iterator.itemWidth;
2794 gf.justified = line.justified;
2795 gf.initWithScriptItem(si);
2796
2797 Q_ASSERT(gf.fontEngine);
2798
2799 QPointF pos(iterator.x.toReal(), itemBaseLine.toReal());
2800 if (format.penProperty(propertyId: QTextFormat::TextOutline).style() != Qt::NoPen) {
2801 QPainterPath path;
2802 path.setFillRule(Qt::WindingFill);
2803
2804 if (gf.glyphs.numGlyphs)
2805 gf.fontEngine->addOutlineToPath(pos.x(), pos.y(), gf.glyphs, &path, flags: gf.flags);
2806 if (gf.flags) {
2807 const QFontEngine *fe = gf.fontEngine;
2808 const qreal lw = fe->lineThickness().toReal();
2809 if (gf.flags & QTextItem::Underline) {
2810 qreal offs = fe->underlinePosition().toReal();
2811 path.addRect(x: pos.x(), y: pos.y() + offs, w: gf.width.toReal(), h: lw);
2812 }
2813 if (gf.flags & QTextItem::Overline) {
2814 qreal offs = fe->ascent().toReal() + 1;
2815 path.addRect(x: pos.x(), y: pos.y() - offs, w: gf.width.toReal(), h: lw);
2816 }
2817 if (gf.flags & QTextItem::StrikeOut) {
2818 qreal offs = fe->ascent().toReal() / 3;
2819 path.addRect(x: pos.x(), y: pos.y() - offs, w: gf.width.toReal(), h: lw);
2820 }
2821 }
2822
2823 p->save();
2824 p->setRenderHint(hint: QPainter::Antialiasing);
2825 //Currently QPen with a Qt::NoPen style still returns a default
2826 //QBrush which != Qt::NoBrush so we need this specialcase to reset it
2827 if (p->pen().style() == Qt::NoPen)
2828 p->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
2829 else
2830 p->setBrush(p->pen().brush());
2831
2832 p->setPen(format.textOutline());
2833 p->drawPath(path);
2834 p->restore();
2835 } else {
2836 if (noText)
2837 gf.glyphs.numGlyphs = 0; // slightly less elegant than it should be
2838 QPainterPrivate::get(painter: p)->drawTextItem(p: pos, ti: gf, textEngine: eng);
2839 }
2840
2841 if ((si.analysis.flags == QScriptAnalysis::Space
2842 || si.analysis.flags == QScriptAnalysis::Nbsp)
2843 && (eng->option.flags() & QTextOption::ShowTabsAndSpaces)) {
2844 QBrush c = format.foreground();
2845 if (c.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
2846 p->setPen(c.color());
2847 const QChar visualSpace = si.analysis.flags == QScriptAnalysis::Space ? u'\xb7' : u'\xb0';
2848 QFont oldFont = p->font();
2849 p->setFont(eng->font(si));
2850 p->drawText(p: QPointF(iterator.x.toReal(), itemBaseLine.toReal()), s: visualSpace);
2851 p->setPen(pen);
2852 p->setFont(oldFont);
2853 }
2854 }
2855 eng->drawDecorations(painter: p);
2856
2857 if (xlateToFixedRange)
2858 p->translate(offset: -origPos);
2859
2860 if (eng->hasFormats())
2861 p->setPen(pen);
2862}

2864/*!
2865 \fn int QTextLine::cursorToX(int cursorPos, Edge edge) const
2866
2867 \overload
2868*/
2869
2870/*!
2871 Converts the cursor position \a cursorPos to the corresponding x position
2872 inside the line, taking account of the \a edge.
2873
2874 If \a cursorPos is not a valid cursor position, the nearest valid
2875 cursor position will be used instead, and \a cursorPos will be modified to
2876 point to this valid cursor position.
2877
2878 \sa xToCursor()
2879*/
2880qreal QTextLine::cursorToX(int *cursorPos, Edge edge) const
2881{
2882 const QScriptLine &line = eng->lines[index];
2883 bool lastLine = index >= eng->lines.size() - 1;
2884
2885 QFixed x = line.x + eng->alignLine(line) - eng->leadingSpaceWidth(line);
2886
2887 if (!eng->layoutData)
2888 eng->itemize();
2889 if (!eng->layoutData->items.size()) {
2890 *cursorPos = line.from;
2891 return x.toReal();
2892 }
2893
2894 int lineEnd = line.from + line.length + line.trailingSpaces;
2895 int pos = qBound(min: line.from, val: *cursorPos, max: lineEnd);
2896 const QCharAttributes *attributes = eng->attributes();
2897 if (!attributes) {
2898 *cursorPos = line.from;
2899 return x.toReal();
2900 }
2901 while (pos < lineEnd && !attributes[pos].graphemeBoundary)
2902 pos++;
2903 // end of line ensure we have the last item on the line
2904 int itm = pos == lineEnd ? eng->findItem(strPos: pos-1) : eng->findItem(strPos: pos);
2905 if (itm < 0) {
2906 *cursorPos = line.from;
2907 return x.toReal();
2908 }
2909 eng->shapeLine(line);
2910
2911 const QScriptItem *scriptItem = &eng->layoutData->items[itm];
2912 if (!scriptItem->num_glyphs)
2913 eng->shape(item: itm);
2914
2915 if ((scriptItem->analysis.bidiLevel % 2 != eng->isRightToLeft()) && !eng->visualCursorMovement()) {
2916 // If the item we found has a different writing direction than the engine,
2917 // check if the cursor is between two items with different writing direction
2918 int neighborItem = itm;
2919 if (neighborItem > 0 && scriptItem->position == pos)
2920 --neighborItem;
2921 else if (neighborItem < eng->layoutData->items.size() - 1 && scriptItem->position + scriptItem->num_glyphs == pos)
2922 ++neighborItem;
2923 const bool onBoundary = neighborItem != itm && scriptItem->analysis.bidiLevel != eng->layoutData->items[neighborItem].analysis.bidiLevel;
2924 // If we are, prioritise the neighbor item that has the same direction as the engine
2925 if (onBoundary) {
2926 if (eng->isRightToLeft() != scriptItem->analysis.bidiLevel % 2) {
2927 itm = neighborItem;
2928 scriptItem = &eng->layoutData->items[itm];
2929 if (!scriptItem->num_glyphs)
2930 eng->shape(item: itm);
2931 }
2932 }
2933 }
2934
2935 const int l = eng->length(item: itm);
2936 pos = qBound(min: 0, val: pos - scriptItem->position, max: l);
2937
2938 QGlyphLayout glyphs = eng->shapedGlyphs(si: scriptItem);
2939 unsigned short *logClusters = eng->logClusters(si: scriptItem);
2940 Q_ASSERT(logClusters);
2941
2942 int glyph_pos = pos == l ? scriptItem->num_glyphs : logClusters[pos];
2943 if (edge == Trailing && glyph_pos < scriptItem->num_glyphs) {
2944 // trailing edge is leading edge of next cluster
2945 glyph_pos++;
2946 while (glyph_pos < scriptItem->num_glyphs && !glyphs.attributes[glyph_pos].clusterStart)
2947 glyph_pos++;
2948 }
2949
2950 bool reverse = scriptItem->analysis.bidiLevel % 2;
2951
2952
2953 // add the items left of the cursor
2954
2955 int firstItem = eng->findItem(strPos: line.from);
2956 int lastItem = eng->findItem(strPos: lineEnd - 1, firstItem: itm);
2957 int nItems = (firstItem >= 0 && lastItem >= firstItem)? (lastItem-firstItem+1) : 0;
2958
2959 QVarLengthArray<int> visualOrder(nItems);
2960 QVarLengthArray<uchar> levels(nItems);
2961 for (int i = 0; i < nItems; ++i)
2962 levels[i] = eng->layoutData->items[i+firstItem].analysis.bidiLevel;
2963 QTextEngine::bidiReorder(numRuns: nItems, levels: levels.data(), visualOrder: visualOrder.data());
2964
2965 for (int i = 0; i < nItems; ++i) {
2966 int item = visualOrder[i]+firstItem;
2967 if (item == itm)
2968 break;
2969 QScriptItem &si = eng->layoutData->items[item];
2970 if (!si.num_glyphs)
2971 eng->shape(item);
2972
2973 if (si.analysis.flags >= QScriptAnalysis::TabOrObject) {
2974 x += si.width;
2975 continue;
2976 }
2977
2978 const int itemLength = eng->length(item);
2979 int start = qMax(a: line.from, b: si.position);
2980 int end = qMin(a: lineEnd, b: si.position + itemLength);
2981
2982 logClusters = eng->logClusters(si: &si);
2983
2984 int gs = logClusters[start-si.position];
2985 int ge = (end == si.position + itemLength) ? si.num_glyphs-1 : logClusters[end-si.position-1];
2986
2987 QGlyphLayout glyphs = eng->shapedGlyphs(si: &si);
2988
2989 while (gs <= ge) {
2990 x += glyphs.effectiveAdvance(item: gs);
2991 ++gs;
2992 }
2993 }
2994
2995 logClusters = eng->logClusters(si: scriptItem);
2996 glyphs = eng->shapedGlyphs(si: scriptItem);
2997 if (scriptItem->analysis.flags >= QScriptAnalysis::TabOrObject) {
2998 if (pos == (reverse ? 0 : l))
2999 x += scriptItem->width;
3000 } else {
3001 bool rtl = eng->isRightToLeft();
3002 bool visual = eng->visualCursorMovement();
3003 int end = qMin(a: lineEnd, b: scriptItem->position + l) - scriptItem->position;
3004 if (reverse) {
3005 int glyph_end = end == l ? scriptItem->num_glyphs : logClusters[end];
3006 int glyph_start = glyph_pos;
3007 if (visual && !rtl && !(lastLine && itm == (visualOrder[nItems - 1] + firstItem)))
3008 glyph_start++;
3009 for (int i = glyph_end - 1; i >= glyph_start; i--)
3010 x += glyphs.effectiveAdvance(item: i);
3011 x -= eng->offsetInLigature(si: scriptItem, pos, max: end, glyph_pos);
3012 } else {
3013 int start = qMax(a: line.from - scriptItem->position, b: 0);
3014 int glyph_start = logClusters[start];
3015 int glyph_end = glyph_pos;
3016 if (!visual || !rtl || (lastLine && itm == visualOrder[0] + firstItem))
3017 glyph_end--;
3018 for (int i = glyph_start; i <= glyph_end; i++)
3019 x += glyphs.effectiveAdvance(item: i);
3020 x += eng->offsetInLigature(si: scriptItem, pos, max: end, glyph_pos);
3021 }
3022 }
3023
3024 if (eng->option.wrapMode() != QTextOption::NoWrap && x > line.x + line.width)
3025 x = line.x + line.width;
3026 if (eng->option.wrapMode() != QTextOption::NoWrap && x < 0)
3027 x = 0;
3028
3029 *cursorPos = pos + scriptItem->position;
3030 return x.toReal();
3031}

3033/*!
3034 \fn int QTextLine::xToCursor(qreal x, CursorPosition cpos) const
3035
3036 Converts the x-coordinate \a x, to the nearest matching cursor
3037 position, depending on the cursor position type, \a cpos.
3038 Note that result cursor position includes possible preedit area text.
3039
3040 \sa cursorToX()
3041*/
3042int QTextLine::xToCursor(qreal _x, CursorPosition cpos) const
3043{
3044 QFixed x = QFixed::fromReal(r: _x);
3045 const QScriptLine &line = eng->lines[index];
3046 bool lastLine = index >= eng->lines.size() - 1;
3047 int lineNum = index;
3048
3049 if (!eng->layoutData)
3050 eng->itemize();
3051
3052 int line_length = textLength();
3053
3054 if (!line_length)
3055 return line.from;
3056
3057 int firstItem = eng->findItem(strPos: line.from);
3058 int lastItem = eng->findItem(strPos: line.from + line_length - 1, firstItem);
3059 int nItems = (firstItem >= 0 && lastItem >= firstItem)? (lastItem-firstItem+1) : 0;
3060
3061 if (!nItems)
3062 return 0;
3063
3064 x -= line.x;
3065 x -= eng->alignLine(line);
3066// qDebug("xToCursor: x=%f, cpos=%d", x.toReal(), cpos);
3067
3068 QVarLengthArray<int> visualOrder(nItems);
3069 QVarLengthArray<unsigned char> levels(nItems);
3070 for (int i = 0; i < nItems; ++i)
3071 levels[i] = eng->layoutData->items[i+firstItem].analysis.bidiLevel;
3072 QTextEngine::bidiReorder(numRuns: nItems, levels: levels.data(), visualOrder: visualOrder.data());
3073
3074 bool visual = eng->visualCursorMovement();
3075 if (x <= 0) {
3076 // left of first item
3077 if (eng->isRightToLeft())
3078 return line.from + line_length;
3079 return line.from;
3080 } else if (x < line.textWidth || (line.justified && x < line.width)) {
3081 // has to be in one of the runs
3082 QFixed pos;
3083 bool rtl = eng->isRightToLeft();
3084
3085 eng->shapeLine(line);
3086 const auto insertionPoints = (visual && rtl) ? eng->insertionPointsForLine(lineNum) : std::vector<int>();
3087 int nchars = 0;
3088 for (int i = 0; i < nItems; ++i) {
3089 int item = visualOrder[i]+firstItem;
3090 QScriptItem &si = eng->layoutData->items[item];
3091 int item_length = eng->length(item);
3092// qDebug(" item %d, visual %d x_remain=%f", i, item, x.toReal());
3093
3094 int start = qMax(a: line.from - si.position, b: 0);
3095 int end = qMin(a: line.from + line_length - si.position, b: item_length);
3096
3097 unsigned short *logClusters = eng->logClusters(si: &si);
3098
3099 int gs = logClusters[start];
3100 int ge = (end == item_length ? si.num_glyphs : logClusters[end]) - 1;
3101 QGlyphLayout glyphs = eng->shapedGlyphs(si: &si);
3102
3103 QFixed item_width = 0;
3104 if (si.analysis.flags >= QScriptAnalysis::TabOrObject) {
3105 item_width = si.width;
3106 } else {
3107 int g = gs;
3108 while (g <= ge) {
3109 item_width += glyphs.effectiveAdvance(item: g);
3110 ++g;
3111 }
3112 }
3113// qDebug(" start=%d, end=%d, gs=%d, ge=%d item_width=%f", start, end, gs, ge, item_width.toReal());
3114
3115 if (pos + item_width < x) {
3116 pos += item_width;
3117 nchars += end;
3118 continue;
3119 }
3120// qDebug(" inside run");
3121 if (si.analysis.flags >= QScriptAnalysis::TabOrObject) {
3122 if (cpos == QTextLine::CursorOnCharacter)
3123 return si.position;
3124 bool left_half = (x - pos) < item_width/2;
3125
3126 if (bool(si.analysis.bidiLevel % 2) != left_half)
3127 return si.position;
3128 return si.position + 1;
3129 }
3130
3131 int glyph_pos = -1;
3132 QFixed edge;
3133 // has to be inside run
3134 if (cpos == QTextLine::CursorOnCharacter) {
3135 if (si.analysis.bidiLevel % 2) {
3136 pos += item_width;
3137 glyph_pos = gs;
3138 while (gs <= ge) {
3139 if (glyphs.attributes[gs].clusterStart) {
3140 if (pos < x)
3141 break;
3142 glyph_pos = gs;
3143 edge = pos;
3144 }
3145 pos -= glyphs.effectiveAdvance(item: gs);
3146 ++gs;
3147 }
3148 } else {
3149 glyph_pos = gs;
3150 while (gs <= ge) {
3151 if (glyphs.attributes[gs].clusterStart) {
3152 if (pos > x)
3153 break;
3154 glyph_pos = gs;
3155 edge = pos;
3156 }
3157 pos += glyphs.effectiveAdvance(item: gs);
3158 ++gs;
3159 }
3160 }
3161 } else {
3162 QFixed dist = INT_MAX/256;
3163 if (si.analysis.bidiLevel % 2) {
3164 if (!visual || rtl || (lastLine && i == nItems - 1)) {
3165 pos += item_width;
3166 while (gs <= ge) {
3167 if (glyphs.attributes[gs].clusterStart && qAbs(t: x-pos) < dist) {
3168 glyph_pos = gs;
3169 edge = pos;
3170 dist = qAbs(t: x-pos);
3171 }
3172 pos -= glyphs.effectiveAdvance(item: gs);
3173 ++gs;
3174 }
3175 } else {
3176 while (ge >= gs) {
3177 if (glyphs.attributes[ge].clusterStart && qAbs(t: x-pos) < dist) {
3178 glyph_pos = ge;
3179 edge = pos;
3180 dist = qAbs(t: x-pos);
3181 }
3182 pos += glyphs.effectiveAdvance(item: ge);
3183 --ge;
3184 }
3185 }
3186 } else {
3187 if (!visual || !rtl || (lastLine && i == 0)) {
3188 while (gs <= ge) {
3189 if (glyphs.attributes[gs].clusterStart && qAbs(t: x-pos) < dist) {
3190 glyph_pos = gs;
3191 edge = pos;
3192 dist = qAbs(t: x-pos);
3193 }
3194 pos += glyphs.effectiveAdvance(item: gs);
3195 ++gs;
3196 }
3197 } else {
3198 QFixed oldPos = pos;
3199 while (gs <= ge) {
3200 pos += glyphs.effectiveAdvance(item: gs);
3201 if (glyphs.attributes[gs].clusterStart && qAbs(t: x-pos) < dist) {
3202 glyph_pos = gs;
3203 edge = pos;
3204 dist = qAbs(t: x-pos);
3205 }
3206 ++gs;
3207 }
3208 pos = oldPos;
3209 }
3210 }
3211 if (qAbs(t: x-pos) < dist) {
3212 if (visual) {
3213 if (!rtl && i < nItems - 1) {
3214 nchars += end;
3215 continue;
3216 }
3217 if (rtl && nchars > 0)
3218 return insertionPoints[size_t(lastLine ? nchars : nchars - 1)];
3219 }
3220 return eng->positionInLigature(si: &si, end, x, edge: pos, glyph_pos: -1,
3221 cursorOnCharacter: cpos == QTextLine::CursorOnCharacter);
3222 }
3223 }
3224 Q_ASSERT(glyph_pos != -1);
3225 return eng->positionInLigature(si: &si, end, x, edge, glyph_pos,
3226 cursorOnCharacter: cpos == QTextLine::CursorOnCharacter);
3227 }
3228 }
3229 // right of last item
3230 int pos = line.from;
3231 if (!eng->isRightToLeft())
3232 pos += line_length;
3233
3234 // except for the last line we assume that the
3235 // character between lines is a space and we want
3236 // to position the cursor to the left of that
3237 // character.
3238 if (index < eng->lines.size() - 1)
3239 pos = qMin(a: eng->previousLogicalPosition(oldPos: pos), b: pos);
3240
3241 return pos;
3242}
